content: Hi everyone! People from different fields are contributing to the same Lean project (e.g. mathlib4), leading to various notations. Frankly, it is a little bit hard for me to understand Lean 4 codes in other mathematical directions, because I need to lookup the definitions from scratch. Is there tools for translating Lean codes into natural languages automatically (other than LLM)?
#new members > Reverse direction - from Lean proof to human proof
Thank you! :wave:
